Nov. 10, 2007 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
St. Viator High School, Arlington Heights, Illinois, USA Most entertaining band: Fountain City Brass Band Best cornet of the day: Raquel Rodriquez (Fountain City Brass Band) Best featured brass soloist: Raquel Rodriquez (cornet, Fountain City Brass Band) Best performance of a march: Wingates (playing Ravenswood) Best new composition or arrangement: Wicked (played by Wingates) Most outstanding percussion section: Brass Band of Central Florida
June 5, 2009, 12:45 p.m. Oct. 15, 2014, 10:35 a.m.
